trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Wayne
There were no other sightings in Fort Wayne on or around February 20th 2009
Summary: Very brite star like light w/red light on top.
divs: Sighting Detailsi went out the back door to smoke around 9pm.i walked around front with the thought to look for ufos(which i dont ever do).there was a very brite light out to the NW.looked like it would be around Lima and Carrol rd area.i watched it for some minutes.i thought it did a left rite zig zag faster than any plane should but very far away.leaned on porch post to make sure i wasnt swaying in the wind.did it acouple more times but mostly stayed in the same spot.got my wife to look at it.she thought it was weird and deffinately not a star.it also had a red light on top.it gradually got lower and farther away but it would just sit in one spot for awhile.it took it about 30 minutes to move lower and farther away until i couldnt see it anymore.saw it again last night.didnt have time to watch it with my daughter.it was about in the same spot but higher.looked out window was still there.read daughter bedtime story sat with her for a few minutes went out side and it was gone.
